sentences.sentence: Kill me, dethrone me, but please leave me a little dignity!
sentences.translation: 夺去我的命，夺去我的皇位吧，但至少留与朕一点尊严吧！

sentences.sentence: The plant may dethrone an 18-leaf clover, also found by Shigeo, in the Guinness World Records.
sentences.translation: 该植物将超过同样是小原发现的18叶三叶草的吉尼斯世界纪录。

sentences.sentence: Do you think Sony has what it takes to dethrone Apple? Is it too late? Sound off in the comments!
sentences.translation: 你认为索尼能采取什么措施打败苹果呢？这会不会太晚？赶快发表你的评论吧！
